===Etymology===
[[千]] ([[one]] [[thousand]]) + [[里]] ([[w:li (unit)|li]]) + [[草]] ([[grass]])
: The Chinese character for [[w:Dong (surname)|Dong]] is [[董]]. The character [[董]] is composed of three components: [[千]] ([[one]] [[thousand]]) + [[里]] ([[w:li (unit)|li]]) + [[艹]] ([[grass]]). In other words, the phrase, "The grass spreads out for thousands of [[w:li (unit)|li]]" is a veiled reference to the [[w:Dong (surname)|Dong]] [[w:Chinese surname|surname]].
